headline: Seaport Research Initiates Coverage of Verisk Analytics (VRSK) Stock with a Buy Rating
summary: Verisk Analytics, Inc. (NASDAQ:VRSK) is one of the Best Beaten Down Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On October 1, Seaport Research analyst John Mazzoni initiated coverage of the company’s stock with a “Buy” rating and a price objective of $280. The firm views Verisk Analytics, Inc. (NASDAQ:VRSK) as a top defensive pick in […]

headline: Assessing Verisk Analytics (VRSK) Valuation Following Strategic Product Launches and Enhanced AI Capabilities
summary: Verisk Analytics (VRSK) has been busy, introducing a property rebuild assessment tool in the U.K., rolling out a pet health insurance solution in the U.S., and expanding its AI-powered medical review services through a new partnership. See our latest analysis for Verisk Analytics. Despite these ambitious launches, Verisk Analytics' share price has struggled in 2025, slipping 13.9% year-to-date and down more than 20% over the past three months. While recent products have generated buzz, the...

headline: Could Verisk Analytics’ (VRSK) New Insurance Solutions Signal a Strategic Shift in Market Focus?
summary: In recent weeks, Verisk Analytics launched the Commercial Rebuild solution for U.K. commercial property insurance and introduced a standardized pet health insurance program for U.S. insurers, while announcing a new collaboration with Jopari Solutions to enhance insurance medical record review through AI. These developments respond to industry challenges in underinsurance, data standardization, and claims efficiency, positioning Verisk as a key provider of technology-driven insurance...
